UA-4.name: User Authentication
UA-4.description: Handles user registration, login, and session management with enhanced security.
UA-4.verification_plan: Testing on both iOS and Android devices to ensure functionality across both platforms.

TM-4.name: Task Management
TM-4.description: Allows users to create, edit, and delete tasks with advanced features like task prioritization and categorization.

embodiment.principle: React Native UI Components with Redux State Management
embodiment.description: Advanced task management with state management for better performance.

TM-4.verification_plan: Unit and integration testing to validate task management functionality.

PN-4.name: Push Notifications
PN-4.description: Sends personalized push notifications for upcoming task deadlines using advanced targeting.

embodiment.principle: Firebase Cloud Messaging with Advanced Targeting
embodiment.description: Personalized push notifications for better user engagement.

PN-4.verification_plan: Testing push notifications on multiple devices to ensure delivery and accuracy.

DS-4.name: Data Synchronization
DS-4.description: Syncs tasks across multiple devices using a cloud-based backend with real-time updates.

embodiment.principle: Firebase Realtime Database with Real-Time Updates
embodiment.description: Real-time data synchronization for enhanced performance.

DS-4.verification_plan: Testing data synchronization across multiple devices.

UI-4.name: User Interface
UI-4.description: Provides an enhanced user-friendly interface with a clean and modern design, including animations and gestures.

embodiment.description: Enhanced UI with animations and gestures for better user experience.

UI-4.verification_plan: Conducting usability testing with a focus group to gather feedback on the interface design.

TS-4.name: Task Sharing
TS-4.description: Allows users to share tasks with other users with enhanced access control and permissions.

embodiment.principle: Firebase Database Sharing with Access Control
embodiment.description: Enhanced task sharing with access control for better security.

TS-4.verification_plan: Testing task sharing functionality with enhanced access control.
